name: Save The Queen (Aries Developer)
description: The story is about the Kingdom of Gaia, ruled by King Ares. King Ares is on a mission to discover new lands when he finds out the Night Caller has attacked his kingdom and kidnapped the queen. The King fights the army of Night Caller on each level (Total 5) i.e., each level is the different state of the kingdom. The king has the save the queen as he must fight till the 5th level and to complete the missions on time.
